answerText: lysosomes[10] Enzymes that are bound for lysosomes are tagged in the Golgi apparatus with this molecule.

subject: Science
question: Question: These organelles contain acid hydrolase enzymes to break down waste materials.  [10] Name these organelles that can break down worn-out organelles or food particles.
